PAD_DarkJusticiar.synopsis: Shadowheart is walking along the corridors of the trials and is clearly excited about the prospect of finally proving herself worthy.

PAD_ObjectOfDarknessPlaque.synopsis: The player discovers the name of the Shar trial.
PAD_ObjectOfDarknessPlaque.how_to_trigger: A player interacts with the plaque for the Object of Darkness trial.S_SHA_ObjectOfDarknessPlaque

PAD_PathOfDarknessHint.synopsis: The player comments after possibly figuring out a clue to successfully completing one of the trials in the Temple of Shar. They must safely cross the room while remembering where the platforms along the way are.
PAD_PathOfDarknessHint.how_to_trigger: Begin the trial. If the player read a book in the library beforehand, they'll get the correct clue. Otherwise no.

PAD_MentalTortureHint.synopsis: The player comments after entering one of the trial areas in the temple of Shar. If they read a book in the library before, they'll repeat a hint contained in it about how to complete the trial (defeat their double). Otherwise they'll plead ignorance.
PAD_MentalTortureHint.how_to_trigger: Enter the trial area after having read/not read the hint book from the library.

PAD_TortureRoomPlaque.synopsis: The player discovers the name of the Shar trial.
PAD_TortureRoomPlaque.how_to_trigger: A player interacts with the plaque for the Torture trial.S_SHA_TortureRoomPlaque

PAD_PathOfDarknessSecondWarning.synopsis: Shar warns player that they only have one attempt left.

PAD_ShadowheartIntro.synopsis: Shadowheart answers the Shar statue with affirmation.
PAD_ShadowheartIntro.how_to_trigger: 1. goto -754; -6; -7532.. Wait for SHA_VoiceOfShar_AD_TrialIntro to finish playing.

PAD_TeleportedByShadow.synopsis: A player was seen by a ghost while attempting the sneaking trial in the Shar Temple and teleported back to the beginning of the trial.
PAD_TeleportedByShadow.how_to_trigger: Get seen by a ghost during the sneaking trial.

PAD_HaveAllGems.synopsis: Shadowheart reveals her anticipation and her eagerness to proceed once all trial gems have been collected to open the way to Nightsong.
PAD_HaveAllGems.how_to_trigger: 0. Know Shadowheart is a Sharran1. Loot all of the Umbral Gems with Shadowheart nearby

PAD_PathOfDarknessFirstWarning.synopsis: Shar warns player that they only have two attempts left.

PAD_DontHaveGem.synopsis: The player attempts to place a Sharran gem in the temple puzzle, but they do not have one.
PAD_DontHaveGem.how_to_trigger: Click a gem slot without having a Sharran gem in inventory.

PAD_SpotGem.synopsis: The player notices one of the Trial Gems and points it out. If the player knows that the altar requires the gems, they will reiterate the gem's use. Reactivity for finding additional gems subsequently.
PAD_SpotGem.how_to_trigger: Approach one of the trial gems after completing a trial

PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint.synopsis: The player speaks up on entering one of the trial areas in the temple of Shar. If they had previously read a book in the library area, they'll have an idea of what they need to do (navigate the maze and get through the locked door on the far side without being detected/setting off a trap). Otherwise they'll be none the wiser.
PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint.how_to_trigger: Enter the trial area after having read/not read the clue book in the library

PAD_PathOfDarknessPlaque.synopsis: The player discovers the name of the Shar trial.
PAD_PathOfDarknessPlaque.how_to_trigger: A player interacts with the plaque for the Path of Darkness trial.

PAD_DarkJusticiar_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DarkJusticiar_0.text: Countless initiates walked these halls once, seeking to become Dark Justiciars.

PAD_DarkJusticiar_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_DarkJusticiar_1.text: I will follow in their path. I will succeed.

PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_0.text: This must be what that book meant. I need to get across - and that means remembering where these platforms are.

PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_2.speaker: Player
PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_2.text: I don't understand - what am I supposed to do?

PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_3.speaker: Player
PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_3.text: The Dark Justiciars were said to be sure of foot in even the darkest recesses of Lady Shar's embrace. I must remember where to step, and have faith that she will guide me.

PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_1.speaker: Player
PAD_PathOfDarknessHint_1.text: I must remember where to step, and have faith that she will guide me.

PAD_MentalTortureHint_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MentalTortureHint_0.text: The book was clear - I need to fight myself if I'm to pass this trial.

PAD_MentalTortureHint_1.speaker: Player
PAD_MentalTortureHint_1.text: The Dark Lady teaches us that we are our own worst enemy, much of the time. Her embrace will elude us until we shed that which holds us back.
PAD_MentalTortureHint_1.context: NodeContext: Reverent, as if quoting religious teachings from memory. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_MentalTortureHint_2.speaker: Player
PAD_MentalTortureHint_2.text: What am I supposed to do here...?

PAD_PathOfDarknessSecondWarning_0.text: Disappointing. Succeed or fail, the next attempt shall be the last.

PAD_ShadowheartIntro_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartIntro_0.text: I shall prove myself worthy, Lady Shar.

AD_LightTrialShadow_0.speaker: Shadow, Shadow
AD_LightTrialShadow_0.text: A true child of the Nightsinger embraces the shadows and passes unseen.

PAD_TeleportedByShadow_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedByShadow_0.text: Damn. That shade knocked me right back to the start.

PAD_HaveAllGems_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_HaveAllGems_0.text: That's the last one. The inner sanctum is within reach now.

PAD_PathOfDarknessFirstWarning_0.text: Unfortunate. Fail twice more, and my embrace may elude you.

PAD_DontHaveGem_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DontHaveGem_0.text: Don't have anything to put here.

PAD_SpotGem_0.speaker: Player
PAD_SpotGem_0.text: A gem. Looks like it might fit in the altar from before.
PAD_SpotGem_0.context: NodeContext: Karlach note: open to interpretation (to mean 'hey, I spotted it!)  but inspired by jimmy durante

PAD_SpotGem_2.speaker: Player
PAD_SpotGem_2.text: Another gem. They must be used for something.

PAD_SpotGem_3.speaker: Player
PAD_SpotGem_3.text: Another gem. There must be one for each trial.

PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_0.text: Lady Shar values those that can remain unseen and can still obtain what they want. Stealth is a virtue derived from her very essence.
PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_0.context: NodeContext: Reverent, as if quoting religious teachings from memory. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_1.text: I feel like I'm missing something here... what am I supposed to do?

PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_2.speaker: Player
PAD_ObjectOfDarknessHint_2.text: Like the book said - I've to get through this maze without getting caught or triggering a trap. Simple... I hope.
